name: Wang & Hwang Group Limited
description: Wang & Hwang Group Limited is a diversified holding company with a primary focus on the development and management of real estate properties in Asia. Established in 1995, the company has built a reputation for delivering high-quality residential and commercial projects that meet the evolving demands of urban living. Wang & Hwang Group is committed to sustainable development practices, integrating green technologies into its construction processes, and enhancing the quality of life in the communities it serves. The company operates through various subsidiaries engaged in construction, property management, and investment activities. Wang & Hwang Group has expanded its portfolio to include luxury residential towers, commercial complexes, and mixed-use developments that attract both local and international investors. With a strong emphasis on innovation and customer satisfaction, the company aims to create long-lasting value and foster economic growth in the regions it operates. Its mission is to be a leading player in the real estate sector while maintaining a commitment to environmental stewardship and corporate social responsibility.

seo.meta_title: Wang & Hwang Group Limited | Real Estate and Construction
seo.meta_description: Explore Wang & Hwang Group Limited, a leading real estate developer committed to sustainable urban living through innovative residential and commercial projects.

faq.question: What does Wang & Hwang Group specialize in?
faq.answer: Wang & Hwang Group specializes in real estate development and property management.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Wang & Hwang Group?
faq.answer: The CEO of Wang & Hwang Group is Mr. Hwang Wei.

faq.question: Where is Wang & Hwang Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Wang & Hwang Group is headquartered in Hong Kong, China.

faq.question: What types of properties does Wang & Hwang Group develop?
faq.answer: Wang & Hwang Group develops luxury residential properties and commercial real estate.

faq.question: When was Wang & Hwang Group founded?
faq.answer: Wang & Hwang Group was founded in 1995.
